manifest_description.message: Rotate and flip images in the browser.

settings_popup_install.message: Rotate Images has been installed. Please, take a look at the Settings!

settings_popup_update.message: Rotate Images has been updated. Please, take a look at the Changelog to find out what's new!

settings_duration_warning.message: Duration value must be between 0 and 1000 milliseconds!

settings_key_warning.message: You have set one key for multiple actions!

settings_content_howToUse_open.message: Open the image in a new tab then use the shortcuts.

settings_content_howToUse_transition.message: Set the duration and the timing of the transition to achive nicer and smoother animation.

settings_content_performance_lag.message: If you have a weaker machine and you experience lag, set the duration of the transition to 0!

settings_content_notes_howItWorks.message: Rotate Images looks for image filename extensions in the URL. If the server tricks with the filename, this addon may not work.

settings_content_notes_currentSupport.message: Rotate Images currently supports the following image types:

settings_content_notes_operaPolicy.message: According to Opera's policy, extensions don't work on internal browser pages like Settings, History or this page.

settings_content_credits_createdBy.message: Rotate Images is created by Robert Toth.

settings_content_credits_copyCode.message: Besides my own coding I use some layout and style from the internal pages made by Opera Software ASA.

settings_content_credits_thanks.message: Thanks for every contributor! (See the changelog for details!)

settings_content_warning_notResponsible.message: This extension was not made by Opera Software ASA. The company is not responsible for any of the errors.

settings_content_license_share.message: You can share this extension, but I ask you to link the download page instead of copying the NEX file.

settings_content_license_copy.message: You can copy and modify the code of this extension as long as it's free and you use the proper credits.

settings_content_permissions_tabs.message: Rotate Images needs permission to access your tabs only to open the settings page when the extension is installed or updated.

settings_content_permissions_data.message: Rotate Images needs permission to access your data to get access to the images.
